turns.text: But also, I'd like to point out that all four pizzas need to be gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium gluten free pizzas, 2 cheese, 1 pepperoni, and 1 meatlovers, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 4 medium gluten free pizzas, 2 cheese, 1 pepperoni, and 1 meatlovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $80, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.text: I would like to pick up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
